language.dpinstTitle: PlayStation(R) VITA USB Driver for PlayStation(R) Mobile Installer
language.welcomeTitle: Start installation of PlayStation(R) VITA USB Driver.
language.welcomeIntro: This wizard will walk you through installing the PlayStation(R) VITA USB Driver. This driver is for use with PlayStation(R) VITA in development.
language.finishTitle: Installation of PlayStation(R) VITA USB Driver is complete.

language.dpinstTitle: PlayStation(R) VITA USB Driver for PlayStation(R) Mobile Installer
language.welcomeTitle: PlayStation(R) VITA USB Driver インストールを開始します
language.welcomeIntro: ウィザードに従い PlayStation(R) VITA USB Driver をインストールします。本ドライバーは PlayStation(R) VITA を開発に用いる場合に使用されます
